title: Best Apple iPad 11th Gen (2025) chargers

excerpt: Charge your iPad 11th Gen quickly with these best fast chargers.
text: The iPad 11th Gen is the newest base iPad model you can get. It is same as the previous generation for the most part barring a few aspects. The biggest differences include a slightly bigger 11-inch display and a new A16 Bionic processor. It is powered by a 28.93 Wh battery which is similar to the previous generation. It is claimed to deliver up to 10 hours of web browsing through WiFi or watching video. If you are looking to get a new fast charger for the iPad, we are here to help. Check out these best Apple iPad 11th Gen (2025) chargers you can get. Best iPad 11th Gen (2025) cases Best iPad 11th Gen (2025) screen protectors Apple 20W USB-C Charger This is the official Apple charger you get with the iPad. If you misplaced it or it got damaged and want to buy it again, you can get it from here. It has a single USB-C port with a peak output of 20W. Apple 30W USB-C Charger This is a 30W official charger for the iPad. It has a single USB-C port and can charger your iPad much faster than the 20W charging brick. Available in a single White color. Apple 35W Dual USB-C Charger This is the official 35W charger from Apple for the iPad. The best part is it comes with dual USB Type-C ports. It means you can charge two devices simultaneously with the charger. Sale Anker PowerPort III 2-port 40W Charger This is a 40W charger with dual USB-C ports. It comes with MultiProtect safety technology and has foldable prongs. Available in White and Black colors. Anker PowerPort III 20W Charger (2-pack) It is a compact-sized 20W charger with a single USB-C port. Comes with high voltage protection, temperature control, and current regulation safety features. Foldable prongs help with portability. Package has two chargers but no charging cable. Sale Baseus 30W 2-port Charger Baseus' charger has dual ports featuring one USB-C and one microUSB port. These can deliver up to 18W and 12W charging speeds individually when using both at the same time. It is a compact-sized charger and has prongs that can be folded. UGREEN Nexode 100W 4-port Charger This is a charger featuring three USB-C ports and a USB-A port. It can deliver a peak power output of 100W and can charge up to four devices at the same time. It is quite compact considering it is a 100W charger. Foldable plugs make it easy to carry around. UGREEN Nexode Mini 30W Charger This is a single USB-C port with a peak power output of 30W. It is smaller in size and features foldable prongs. It has always-on temperature detection for keeping device temperature in check. html:
The iPad 11th Gen is the newest base iPad model you can get. It is same as the previous generation for the most part barring a few aspects. The biggest differences include a slightly bigger 11-inch display and a new A16 Bionic processor.

It is powered by a 28.93 Wh battery which is similar to the previous generation. It is claimed to deliver up to 10 hours of web browsing through WiFi or watching video. If you are looking to get a new fast charger for the iPad, we are here to help. Check out these best Apple iPad 11th Gen (2025) chargers you can get.

  • Best iPad 11th Gen (2025) cases
  • Best iPad 11th Gen (2025) screen protectors

Apple 20W USB-C Charger

This is the official Apple charger you get with the iPad. If you misplaced it or it got damaged and want to buy it again, you can get it from here. It has a single USB-C port with a peak output of 20W.

Apple 30W USB-C Charger

This is a 30W official charger for the iPad. It has a single USB-C port and can charger your iPad much faster than the 20W charging brick. Available in a single White color.

Apple 35W Dual USB-C Charger

This is the official 35W charger from Apple for the iPad. The best part is it comes with dual USB Type-C ports. It means you can charge two devices simultaneously with the charger.

Sale

Anker PowerPort III 2-port 40W Charger

This is a 40W charger with dual USB-C ports. It comes with MultiProtect safety technology and has foldable prongs. Available in White and Black colors.

Anker PowerPort III 20W Charger (2-pack)

It is a compact-sized 20W charger with a single USB-C port. Comes with high voltage protection, temperature control, and current regulation safety features. Foldable prongs help with portability. Package has two chargers but no charging cable.

Sale

Baseus 30W 2-port Charger

Baseus' charger has dual ports featuring one USB-C and one microUSB port. These can deliver up to 18W and 12W charging speeds individually when using both at the same time. It is a compact-sized charger and has prongs that can be folded.

UGREEN Nexode 100W 4-port Charger

This is a charger featuring three USB-C ports and a USB-A port. It can deliver a peak power output of 100W and can charge up to four devices at the same time. It is quite compact considering it is a 100W charger. Foldable plugs make it easy to carry around.

UGREEN Nexode Mini 30W Charger

This is a single USB-C port with a peak power output of 30W. It is smaller in size and features foldable prongs. It has always-on temperature detection for keeping device temperature in check.

Note: this article may contain affiliate links that help support our authors and keep the Phandroid servers running.
